DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._A pathologic process in which alterations at the molecular level result in a more aggressive cytologic and phenotypic profile and clinical course of a malignant neoplasm._A symptom or medical condition that makes a particular treatment or procedure inadvisable because a person is likely to have a bad reaction._A short textual account; having provided a short account.
